Uses of Class
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers.DatacenterBrokerSimple

  • Packages that use DatacenterBrokerSimple 
    Package Description
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers
    Provides DatacenterBroker classes that act on behalf of a cloud customer, attending his/her requests for creation and destruction of Cloudlets and VMs, assigning such Cloudlets to specific VMs.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers.network  
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers.power  
    org.cloudsimplus.builders
    Provides Builder classes that implement the Builder Design Pattern to allow instantiating multiple simulation objects more easily.

    • Uses of DatacenterBrokerSimple in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers

      Subclasses of DatacenterBrokerSimple in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DatacenterBrokerHeuristic
      A simple implementation of DatacenterBroker that uses some heuristic to get a suboptimal mapping among submitted cloudlets and Vm's.

    • Uses of DatacenterBrokerSimple in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers.network

      Subclasses of DatacenterBrokerSimple in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers.network 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NetworkDatacenterBroker
      NetDatacentreBroker is a DatacenterBroker implementation that works with network components such as NetworkDatacenter, NetworkHost and NetworkVm.

    • Uses of DatacenterBrokerSimple in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers.power

      Subclasses of DatacenterBrokerSimple in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers.power 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PowerDatacenterBroker
      A power-aware DatacenterBrokerSimple.

    • Uses of DatacenterBrokerSimple in org.cloudsimplus.builders

      Constructors in org.cloudsimplus.builders with parameters of type DatacenterBrokerSimple
